question.text:
Match the columns I and II, and choose the correct combination from the options given.
 
Column I Column II
(a) Haplontic life-cycle (i) Gymnosperms and Angiosperms
(b) Diplontic life-cycle (ii) Spirogyra
(c) Haplo-diplontic life (iii) Bryophytes and Pteridophytes

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>—iii</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>—</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math>

solution.text:
The main form of the haplontic life cycle is haploid and diploid zygote is formed in this cycle for a short period of time and this type of life cycle is found in Spirogyra.

The main form of a diplontic life cycle is diploid which produces gametes and this type of life cycle is found in Gymnosperm and Angiosperm.

In haplo-diplontic life cycle, multicellular diploid sporophyte is present which produces haploid spores via meiosis and it is found in Bryophyta and Pteridophyta.
